Translations.Text: ‘ami tara ‘ibadata kari na yara ‘ibadata tomara kara
Ebam tomara'o tamra ‘ibadatakari na'o yamra ‘ibadata ami kari
ebam ami ‘ibadatakari na'i tara yara ‘ibadata tomara kare asacha
Ebam tomara'o tamra ‘ibadatakari habe na yamra ‘ibadata ami kari
tomadera dina tomadera, ara amara dbina amara [1].’
Yakhana asabe allahara sahayya o bijaya
ara apani manusake dale dale allahara dine prabesa karate dekhabena
takhana apani apanara rabera prasansasaha tamra pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna ebam tamra kache ksama prarthana karuna, niscaya tini ta'oba kabulakari
Dhbansa hoka abu lahabera [1] du‘hata [2] ebam dhbansa hayeche se nije'o
Tara dhana-sampada o tara uparjana [1] tara kono kaje ase ni
Acire se dagdha habe lelihana agune
ara tara stri'o [1]- ye indhana bahana kare
